Title: Deep Blue Sea 2
Writer: Duncan Kennedy (based on characters created by), Donna Powers (based on characters created by), Wayne Powers (based on characters created by), Hans Rodionoff (story by), Hans Rodionoff (teleplay by), Erik Patterson (teleplay by), Jessica Scott (teleplay by)
Actors: Danielle Savre, Rob Mayes, Michael Beach, Nathan Lynn
Plot: A brilliant billionaire named Carl Durant is experimenting on bull sharks, which soon rebel to cause havoc for a group of scientists.
